questions_1.question: Which of the following are the components of the Fuel Indicating Subsystem?
Options: Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel flowmeter between the MFC and the fuel manifold.
Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel low pressure switch connected to the inlet pressure tap on the fuel pump.
Impending bypass switch and electrical connector on the fuel filter housing.
Bypass indication button on the fuel filter housing.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel flowmeter between the MFC and the fuel manifold, Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel low pressure switch connected to the inlet pressure tap on the fuel pump, Impending bypass switch and electrical connector on the fuel filter housing, Bypass indication button on the fuel filter housing."
questions_1.partialFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

The valid answer is "Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel flowmeter between the MFC and the fuel manifold, Airframe manufacturer-supplied fuel low pressure switch connected to the inlet pressure tap on the fuel pump, Impending bypass switch and electrical connector on the fuel filter housing, Bypass indication button on the fuel filter housing."
